original: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvabuddhaparigraho nāmocyate /
analyzed: tat kim manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena ayam dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvabuddhaparigrahaḥ nāma ucyate
translated: What do you think, Śāriputra, for what reason is this Dharma discourse called 'Embraced by All Buddhas'?

original: ye kecicchāriputra kulaputra vā kuladuhitaro vā asya dharmaparyāyasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti /
analyzed: ye kecid śāriputra kula putra vā kula duhitaraḥ vā asya dharmaparyāyasya nāmadheyam śroṣyanti
translated: Śāriputra, those sons or daughters of good family who will hear the name of this Dharma discourse,

original: teṣāṃ va buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti /
analyzed: teṣām vai buddhānām bhagavatām nāmadheyam dhārayiṣyanti
translated: and will hold the names of those Buddha Bhagavāns,

original: sarve te buddhaparigṛhītā bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: sarve te buddha parigṛhītāḥ bhaviṣyanti
translated: all of them will be accepted by the Buddhas.

original: avinivartanīyāśca bhaviṣyanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau /
analyzed: a vinivartanīyāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti anuttarāyām samyaksambodhau
translated: And they will be irreversible from supreme and perfect awakening.

original: tasmāttarhi śāriputra śraddadhādhvaṃ pratīyatha mā kāṅkṣayatha mama ca teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām /
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi śāriputra śraddadhādhvam pratīyatha mā kāṅkṣayatha mama ca teṣām ca buddhānām bhagavatām
translated: Therefore, Śāriputra, have faith, have conviction, do not doubt me or those Buddha Bhagavāns.

original: ye kecicchāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti /
analyzed: ye kecid śāriputra kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā tasya bhagavataḥ mitāyuṣaḥ tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre citta praṇidhānam kariṣyanti
translated: Śāriputra, those sons or daughters of good family who will make a vow for the Buddha-field of that Bhagavān Amitāyus,

original: kṛtaṃ vā kurvanti vā /
analyzed: kṛtam vā kurvanti vā
translated: whether they have made it, are making it, or will make it,

original: sarve te 'vinivartanīyā bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
analyzed: sarve te vinivartanīyāḥ bhaviṣyanti anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau
translated: all of them will be irreversible from supreme and perfect awakening.

original: tatra ca buddhakṣetra upapatsyanti /
analyzed: tatra ca buddhakṣetre upapatsyanti
translated: And they will be reborn in that Buddha-field.

original: upapannā vā upapadyanti vā /
analyzed: upapannāḥ vai upapadyanti vā
translated: Whether they have been reborn, are being reborn, or will be reborn,

original: tasmāttarhi śāriputra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca tatra buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhirutpādayitavyaḥ // //
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi śāriputra śrāddhaiḥ kula putraiḥ kula duhitṛbhiḥ ca tatra buddhakṣetre citta praṇidhiḥ utpādayitavyaḥ
translated: Therefore, Śāriputra, faithful sons and daughters of good family should arouse the aspiration for enlightenment and the aspiration for the Buddha-field in that Buddha-field.

original: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra ahametarhi teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmevamacintyaguṇān parikīrtayāmi /
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma śāriputra aham etarhi teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām evam acintya guṇān parikīrtayāmi
translated: Just as, Śāriputra, I now extol the inconceivable qualities of those Buddha-Bhagavāns,

original: evameva śāriputra mamāpi te buddhā bhagavanta evamacintyaguṇān parikīrtayanti /
analyzed: evam eva śāriputra mama api te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ evam acintya guṇān parikīrtayanti
translated: in the same way, Śāriputra, those Buddha-Bhagavāns extol my inconceivable qualities.

original: suduṣkaraṃ bhagavatāṃ śākyamuninā śākyādhirājena kṛtam /
analyzed: su duṣkaram bhagavatām śākyamuninā śākya adhirājena kṛtam
translated: The Blessed One Śākyamuni, the King of the Śākyas, has done what is extremely difficult,

original: sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvalokavipratyayanīyo dharmo deśitaḥ kalpakaṣāye sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye
analyzed: sahāyām lokadhātau anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarva loka vipratyayanīyaḥ dharmaḥ deśitaḥ kalpa kaṣāye sattva kaṣāye dṛṣṭi kaṣāye āyuḥ kaṣāye
translated: having attained the highest complete enlightenment in the Sahā world system, he taught the Dharma that is contrary to the world, in an eon defiled by the defilements of the kalpa, defiled by the defilements of beings, defiled by the defilements of views, defiled by the defilements of lifespan,

original: kleśakaṣāye // //
analyzed: kleśa kaṣāye
translated: defiled by the defilements of afflictions,

original: tanmamāpi śāriputra paramaduṣkaraṃ yanmayā sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya
analyzed: tat mama api śāriputra parama duṣkaram yat mayā sahāyām lokadhātau anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
translated: and it is extremely difficult for me also, Śāriputra, having attained the highest complete enlightenment in the Sahā world system,

original: sarvalokavipratyayanīyo dharmo deśitaḥ sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāye kleśakaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye
analyzed: sarva loka vipratyayanīyaḥ dharmaḥ deśitaḥ sattva kaṣāye dṛṣṭi kaṣāye kleśa kaṣāye āyuḥ kaṣāye
translated: to teach the Dharma that is contrary to the world, in an eon defiled by the defilements of beings, defiled by the defilements of views, defiled by the defilements of afflictions, defiled by the defilements of lifespan,

original: kalpakaṣāye // //
translated: In the eon of destruction.

original: idamavocadbhagavānāttamanāḥ /
analyzed: idam avocat bhagavān ātta manāḥ
translated: Thus spoke the Blessed One, and was delighted.

original: āyuṣmān śāriputraste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan // //
analyzed: āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ te ca bhikṣavaḥ te ca bodhisattvāḥ sa deva mānuṣa asura gandharvaḥ ca lokaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhyanandan
translated: The Venerable Śāriputra, those monks, those bodhisattvas, and the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas rejoiced in the Blessed One's words.

original: sukhāvatīvyūho nāma mahāyānasūtram //
analyzed: sukhāvatī vyūhaḥ nāma mahāyāna sūtram
translated: The Mahāyāna Sūtra called The Array of the Land of Bliss

original: saṃkṣiptamātṛkā /
analyzed: saṃkṣipta mātṛkā
translated: The Abridged Mātṛkā.
